definitions.definition: doing the same thing in the same way several times; done in the same way several times

examples.text: He is wanted for serial murder.
Such people can be described as serial monogamists.

definitions.definition: broadcast or published in several separate parts

examples.text: The BBC has taken each installment of Charles Dickens' serial novel ‘Bleak House’ and created 15 half-hour episodes.
tasks carried out in the same serial order
